title: 2 Pcs Extra Thick 8 Inch Cotton Buffing Wheel, 70 Ply Cloth 5/8 Inch Arbor Hole Abrasive Polishing Wheel for Bench Grinder(White)

sample_reviews.title: Good wheels, fraying at first but easily fixed
sample_reviews.text: These are very well made wheels. Yes, they do fray at first. I ran mine, buffing a sharp-ish metal edge, before applying compound to fray them then gave them a "haircut" with scissors. Repeat one or two more times and the fraying will stop. Apply compound and they are good to go. The whole operation takes about 15 minutes or so. Also, they are wide enough (aprox 1") to use without doubling them up.
